Summary: 5 orbs moving from east to west in straight line path, saw first 3 @ 2035 1 @ 2040 1 @ 2045
divs: Sighting DetailsWas leaving my apartment to walk my dogs, when I got to the end of the building a light in the sky caught my eye. I saw three orb shaped objects approx ten feet in diameter and approx seventy feet in the air travel in a direction from east to west. I watched as they disappeared in the west. I then changed my direction and went to the rear of the building where I saw another orb move in the exact same manner and direction. I called my wife to come outside and look with me and she then witnessed the fifth and final orb move in the same manner and direction.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Venice
There were no other sightings in Venice on or around December 15th 2012
